title: STAT+: On eve of JPM, everything’s coming up Big Pharma
description: From the corporate jets of Teterboro Airport to the crowded halls of the J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference, it’s a good time to be a pharmaceutical executive.
content: From the corporate jets of Teterboro Airport to the crowded halls of the J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference, it’s a good time to be a pharmaceutical executive.
